name: Social Phobia
description:
Klonopin

SOCIAL PHOBIA
Social anxiety disorder, also called social phobia, is a long-term and overwhelming fear of social situations. It's a common problem that usually starts during the teenage years. It can be very distressing and have a big impact on your life.

In this game you (Sammie) have Social Phobia. Sammie forgot their Klonopin (an anxiety medication). You travel the map looking for a pill bottle.

You avoid people and belittling sigh like "Just Breath" and "Your Life Is So Good, Why Are You Sad". You can't kill the NPCs because anxiety never dies.

When your anxiety goes up your heart will beat and will try to meditate. If your anxiety goes too high you could have a panic attack (lose).

The way you win is collecting the medicine bottle. You will be transported to a winning screen.

Good Luck!
